sentence.Network_en: Investment remains tiny primarily because of the exorbitant cost of land.
sentence.Network_cn: 投资仍然微乎其微，主要原因在于土地成本过高。

sentence.Network_en: They're charging an exorbitant price for fixing the car, but they've got us over a barrel because we can't do without it.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们修理这部汽车索价太高, 但我们被逼得只好听其摆布,因为我们不能没有汽车.

sentence.Network_en: Exorbitant housing prices have created an acute shortage of affordable housing for the poor.
sentence.Network_cn: 过高的房价已经造成了穷人能够买得起的住房严重短缺。

list.abs: 批评美国因为拥有全球储备货币美元，所享有“超级特权”（exorbitant privilege），这一“超级特权”，在某种程度上自动的为美国带来各 …
在我的新书“嚣张的特权”（Exorbitant Privilege）中有描述，美国曾在1956年苏伊士危机中使用金融武器迫使英国同意它的要求。在法 …
... exhaust price (交易所)押金短少时的价格 exorbitant price 过高的价格, 昂贵的价格 external price 国外价格, 对外价格.
exorbitant是什么意思... ... exorbitant expenditure 消耗过高 exorbitant price 非法价格 exorbitant profit 非法利润，超额利润.
you should be sensible and not make exorbitant demands ., 你应该通情达理 , 不要作过分的要求.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (originally as a legal term describing a case that is outside the scope of a law): from late Latin exorbitant- 'going off the track', from exorbitare, from ex- 'out from' + orbita 'course, track'

entry.def: If you describe something such as a price or fee as exorbitant, you are emphasizing that it is much greater than it should be.

example.ex: Exorbitant housing prices have created an acute shortage of affordable housing for the poor.
example.tran: 过高的房价已经造成了穷人能够买得起的住房严重短缺。

means.word_mean: 1. greatly exceeding bounds of reason or moderation;

auth_sentence.content: One resents being moved by so exorbitant an agony.
auth_sentence.res_content: One resents being moved by so exorbitant an agony.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One resents being moved by so exorbitant an agony.

auth_sentence.content: Zuleika lives at the most exorbitant hotel in all Mayfair.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Zuleika lives at the most exorbitant hotel in all Mayfair.
